columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VESSEL_DUID
columns.description: Donor ID from the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) of the extra vessel used in the transplant.

columns.name: VESSEL_PLACEMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The location of any extra vessels used during transplant.

columns.name: VESSEL_COMMENTS
columns.description: Any comments about the donor vessels used during transplant.

columns.name: VESSEL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of donor vessels used during transplant.
